description: A React component implementing a dashboard page that displays upcoming meetings, fetched asynchronously, and provides functionality such as creating meetings and showing user info.

methods.name: fetchMeetings
methods.description: Async function that returns a list of mock meeting data, simulating an API call.

methods.name: Dashboard
methods.description: React functional component that renders the dashboard UI, fetches meetings on load, and handles user interactions.

methods.name: handleCreateMeeting
methods.description: Function called to handle the creation of a new meeting, currently triggers a notification.
